item.description:
What: Big E Springfield Fair

What you need to know: This fair is extremely popular, plan on sitting in traffic and walking in crowds. We will be setting up carpools so if you are interested in carpooling please include in your RSVP.

We plan on going early afternoon and possibly staying until close (10pm)

Tickets : Can be purchased at the gate or online to avoid lines (there is a $1.00 processing fee for online tickets).

Adults: $15.00

Kids 6-12: $10.00, 5 & under: free

Parking fee: $10.00 per carload

Carpooling: Please remember if you are carpooling to share the cost with all the members in your car, this includes gas, tolls, parking.

What to Bring: Camera, Dress appropriately (lots of walking) and remember its that time of year where you may get cool towards the end of the day so bring appropriate clothes. Don't forget to bring the Meetup cell phone number (978-304-2811) just in case you get separated from the group.

Hope to see you all at the fair

Donna & janet
item.name: Big E Springfield Fair
